title: Why the list of next month's skin sales isn't uploaded yet?
body: Any idea? when it will be uploaded?

replies.body:
I have been trying to hunt down the same information myself, but found nothing. I reached out to @riotsupport and they informed me to keep my eyes on league news updated :) Just thought I'd reach out to ya. 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
oh, that's cool! thank you for the information :)
